column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Let me tell you
column2: perfect for a birthday dinner.  Everything just hit the spot The dry age rib eye was so tender to its taste a butter knife could cut right through it. They even provided melted butter
column3: but to be honest you don't even need it! The crab cakes! Man it was perfect! Not like frozen tasting ones.  Wasn't too much of a fan for the sauce but thankfully you don't need that either
column4: just a squeeze of lemon. & Dessert such greatness the chocolate moose perfect with the vanilla whip on top damn I was full and in heaven tasted like dark chocolate icecream  As a complimentary the waiter forgot the sparkler but provided us with Salted Caramel Ice cream on the house with chocolate that harden.
